markdownRemark.html:
It is told that this item belonged to the Great Nostradamus, and that facing the more hardcore surfactant agents, it managed to resist through the ages and keeps on rocking load after load.

Whatever degree setting or program you use, it keeps on protecting its wearer and his parts from mishaps, and guides him through the most diverse activities.

Item in clean condition
Price  : 450 £
Please contact us if interested

about.subtitle: Hello, I am Mac Blah, The H.E.L.L. Company’s founder.
content: This website reflects my interests, it’s a summary of everything in the world that makes me vibrate, from esoterism to occultism, through some cute stuff also.
Beware, all of these antiques have their share of mystery and some effects you can’t overlook. Read their description carefully and feel free to contact me if you have any question !

content.title: Article 1 - General
article: Every purchase made from The H.E.L.L. Company implies that the client agrees with the following terms.

content.title: Article 2. - Antiques
article: The antiques sold on The H.E.L.L. Company's website are authentic, in a way that they actually exist. However, The H.E.L.L. Company does not guarantee the truth of everything that has been said about them.

content.title: Article 3. - The Soul Payment
article: For every purchase made from The H.E.L.L. Company, the client gives to the company :
- the price of the antique as stated on the website

Thereby, for every purchase made on The H.E.L.L. Company's website, the client is committed to give their soul to the legal owner (here M. Mac Blah) in addition of the price of the antique. In case of a previous soul giving to The H.E.L.L. Company through a previous purchase, it is implied that the client doesn't have to give it one more time. We probably still have it.
Once given, the soul will not be given back, and The H.E.L.L. Company is allowed to use it however they please.

content.title: Article 4. - Price
article: The prices on the website are freely set and prone to change. The H.E.L.L. Company usually launches sales on Halloween.

content.title: Article 5. - Payment Terms
article: You can pay for your purchase :
The soul payment, performed by our demonic teams, is automatic and painless. It occurs when the client checks out.

content.title: Article 6. - Liability
article: The H.E.L.L. Company and their suppliers can't be held responsible for any delay, package not sent or email left without response after an order. We are, indeed, super busy, we have demons to handle and stuff.

content.title: Article 7. - Entrepot 13
article: It is asked to the client not to try to visit Entrepot 13, which is The H.E.L.L. Company's headquarters. This place is not open to the public, and well, it's quite messy.

contact.textHeader: You have a question, a need, a peculiar item you are looking for ? Feel free to contact me, I ALWAYS ANSWER THE PHONE IMMEDIATELY. However, forms aren’t my thing, I’ll try to answer as soon as possible, but well, as I said it’s not my jam, and I recently lost my keyboard so…
